channel.title: Help ++ i tried everything, still didn't work
channel.description:
Error with player 1, Mark java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 100 at client.CreateProjectile(client.java: at client.rangeGFXNPC(client.java:3054) at client.process(client.java:18999) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler. at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
This is my range error, i am using delta and everytime I range it shoots the arrow but doesn't show the hitmark, this is wierd because I dont think I edited any of the range. I also didn't edit anything in the client. Someone told me it was about the array, I'm not a beginner but not a pro so please can someone explain or tell me how i can possibly resolve the problem?
